title: CREATURES: Not From Earth Pack 1 [Aliens, Robots, Lifeforms]
description: “Hear the Unheard – Voices of Other Worlds”
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE


Embark on an auditory journey beyond the stars with “Creatures: Not From Earth 1,” the ultimate voice sound effects pack for game developers. This collection is brimming with otherworldly vocalizations—from the mechanical whirrs of sentient robots to the mystical calls of unknown botos, and the intriguing chatter of alien creatures speaking in unearthly tongues. Each sound is crafted to elevate the immersive experience of futuristic and sci-fi gaming environments, providing a rich tapestry of audio that breathes life into any extraterrestrial concept.


Whether you’re designing an alien marketplace, a robotic uprising, or mysterious intergalactic encounters, these sounds serve as the perfect backdrop, offering versatile usability for a variety of scenarios. The sci-fi tonalities and alien gibberish languages included in this pack are not just sounds are designed to spark creativity and fuel storytelling within your game’s universe.


With “Creatures: Not From Earth 1,” you’re not just getting sound effects; you’re unlocking the potential to create worlds that have never been heard before. Suitable for any game development project that dares to venture into the unknown, this pack is your gateway to innovation in audio design.
technicalDetails:
Features

Sounds are organized into the following folders:

1_Alien_Talks_Clear_Tone

2_Alien_Talks_Scratchy_Tone

3_Robo_Talks_Longer

4_Robo_Talks_Shorter

5_Paranormal_Calls

6_Cute_Roar

7_Robo_Kid

8_Little_Aliens

9_Monster_Growl

10_Acidic_Gut

11_Little_Flying_Robos

12_Creature_Bloodsucker

13_Creature_Furious

14_Creature_Buzzing

15_Creature_Sticky


CLICK TO SEE THE LIST OF FILE NAMES


Features: 

Number of Audio Waves: 657

Number of Audio Cues: 657

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 26:22

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
